name: Mana Bear
description:
We didn't get around to implement the story sadly, but right now there's a map where the player can find three upgrades to movement abilities (Wall jump, Dash and holding on to corners). There are diamonds to collect to increase the score for the player.

Controls:

Moving with arrow keys or WASD, jumping with space. When hanging on to edges you need to press the direction key to hold on.

All programming + art made by velopman and Liioni
